verses.text: And \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* all his \w host|strong="H2428"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*: and \add there were\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* with him, and \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*: and he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w warred|strong="H3898"\w* against it.

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*,

Thy \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and thy \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add is\add* mine; thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* also and thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \add even\add* the \w goodliest|strong="H2896"\w*, \add are\add* mine.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, according to thy \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, I \add am\add* thine, and all that I have.

And the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w speaketh|strong="H0559"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Although I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* me thy \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and thy \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*;

Yet I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* unto thee to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* about this \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, and they shall \w search|strong="H2664"\w* thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; and it shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \add that\add* whatsoever is \w pleasant|strong="H4261"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, they shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* in their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and take \add it\add* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*.\f + \fr 20.6 \ft pleasant: Heb. desirable\f*

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Mark|strong="H3045"\w*, I pray you, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* how this \add man\add* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*: for he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto me for my \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and for my \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and for my \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and for my \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; and I \w denied|strong="H4513"\w* him not.\f + \fr 20.7 \ft I denied…: Heb. I kept not back from him\f*

And all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not \add unto him\add*, nor \w consent|strong="H0014"\w*.

Wherefore he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, All that thou didst \w send|strong="H7971"\w* for to thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: but this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* I \w may|strong="H3201"\w* not \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. And the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* him \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

And \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* do \w so|strong="H6213"\w* unto me, and more \w also|strong="H3254"\w*, if the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* shall \w suffice|strong="H5606"\w* for \w handfuls|strong="H8168"\w* for all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w follow|strong="H7272"\w* me.\f + \fr 20.10 \ft follow…: Heb. are at my feet\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \add him\add*, Let not him that \w girdeth|strong="H2296"\w* on \add his harness\add* \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* himself as he that putteth it \w off|strong="H6605"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \add Ben-hadad\add* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* this \w message|strong="H1697"\w*, as he \add was\add* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*, he and the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* in the \w pavilions|strong="H5521"\w*, that he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Set|strong="H7760"\w* \add yourselves in array\add*. And they \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add themselves in array\add* against the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 20.12 \ft message: Heb. word\f*\f + \fr 20.12 \ft pavilions: or, tents\f*\f + \fr 20.12 \ft Set yourselves…: or, Place the engines. And they placed the engines\f*

¶ And, behold, there \w came|strong="H5066"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*? behold, I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* it into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 20.13  t came: Heb. approached *

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, By whom? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add Even\add* by the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*. Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall \w order|strong="H0631"\w* the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou.\f + \fr 20.14 \ft young…: or, servants\f*\f + \fr 20.14 \ft order: Heb. bind, or, tie\f*

Then he \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, and they were \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w*: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them he \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add being\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* at \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*. But \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \add was\add* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* himself \w drunk|strong="H7910"\w* in the \w pavilions|strong="H5521"\w*, he and the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* that \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* him.

And the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*; and \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, and they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There are \w men|strong="H0582"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Whether they be come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* for \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w take|strong="H8610"\w* them \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*; or whether they be come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* for \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w take|strong="H8610"\w* them \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*.

So these young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* which \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* them.

And they \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: and the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*; and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* them: and \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* on an \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* with the \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*.

¶ And the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H5066"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* thyself, and \w mark|strong="H3045"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* what thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w*: for at the \w return|strong="H8666"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* will come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against thee.

And the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \add are\add* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*; therefore they were \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w* than we; \w but|strong="H0199"\w* let us \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against them in the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*, and \w surely|strong="H3808"\w* we shall be \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w* than they.

And \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w Take|strong="H5493"\w* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* away, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* out of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w captains|strong="H6346"\w* in their rooms:

And \w number|strong="H4487"\w* thee an \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, like the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* that thou hast \w lost|strong="H5307"\w*, \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* for \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* for \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*: and we will \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* them in the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*, \add and\add* surely we shall be \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w* than they. And he \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and did \w so|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 20.25 \ft that thou…: Heb. that was fallen\f*

And it came to pass at the \w return|strong="H8666"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, that \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Aphek|strong="H0663"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 20.26 \ft to fight…: Heb. to the war with Israel\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, and were all \w present|strong="H3557"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* them: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* before them like \w two|strong="H8147"\w* little \w flocks|strong="H2835"\w* of \w kids|strong="H5795"\w*; but the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 20.27 \ft were all…: or, were nourished\f*

¶ And there \w came|strong="H5066"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Because the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, but he \add is\add* not \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w*, therefore will I \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* all this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And they \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* \w one|strong="H0428"\w* over \w against|strong="H5227"\w* the \w other|strong="H0428"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. And \add so\add* it was, that in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* was \w joined|strong="H7126"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w footmen|strong="H7273"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

But the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to \w Aphek|strong="H0663"\w*, into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; and \add there\add* a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \add that were\add* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*. And \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, into an \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*.\f + \fr 20.30 \ft into an…: or, from chamber to chamber: Heb. into a chamber within a chamber\f*

¶ And his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold now, we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add are\add* \w merciful|strong="H2617"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: let us, I pray thee, \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* on our \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* upon our \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, and go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: peradventure he will \w save|strong="H2421"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

So they \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* on their \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \add put\add* \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* on their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, I pray thee, let me \w live|strong="H2421"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* he yet \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*? he \add is\add* my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

Now the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* did diligently \w observe|strong="H5172"\w* whether \add any thing would come\add* from him, and did \w hastily|strong="H4116"\w* \w catch|strong="H2480"\w* \add it:\add* and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*. Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* ye, \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* him. Then \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to him; and he caused him to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*.

And \add Ben-hadad\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, which my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* from thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, I will \w restore|strong="H7725"\w*; and thou shalt \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* for thee in \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, as my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. Then \add said Ahab\add*, I will send thee \w away|strong="H7971"\w* with this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*. So he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with him, and sent him \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.\f + \fr 20.34 \ft streets: or, market places\f*

¶ And a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* in the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* me, I pray thee. And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto him, Because thou hast not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, behold, as soon as thou art \w departed|strong="H1980"\w* from me, a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* shall \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* thee. And as soon as he was \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* from \w him|strong="H0681"\w*, a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* him.

Then he \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* me, I pray thee. And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, so that in \w smiting|strong="H5221"\w* he \w wounded|strong="H6481"\w* \add him\add*.\f + \fr 20.37 \ft so that…: Heb. smiting and wounding\f*

So the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w waited|strong="H5975"\w* for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w disguised|strong="H2664"\w* himself with \w ashes|strong="H0666"\w* upon his \w face|strong="H5869"\w*.

And as the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, he \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*; and, behold, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto me, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* this \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: if by any \w means|strong="H6485"\w* he be \w missing|strong="H6485"\w*, then shall thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w* be for his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, or else thou shalt \w pay|strong="H8254"\w* a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 20.39 \ft pay: Heb. weigh\f*

And as thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* was \w busy|strong="H6213"\w* here and there, he was \w gone|strong="H0369"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, So \add shall\add* thy \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add be;\add* thyself hast \w decided|strong="H2782"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 20.40 \ft he was…: Heb. he was not\f*

And he \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w*, and took the \w ashes|strong="H0666"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from his \w face|strong="H5869"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w discerned|strong="H5234"\w* him that he \add was\add* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Because thou hast let \w go|strong="H7971"\w* out of \add thy\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom I appointed to utter \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w*, therefore thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w* shall go for his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* for his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w heavy|strong="H5620"\w* and \w displeased|strong="H2198"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.
